name: Storm Lord
description: The Storm Lord is a formidable Huge elemental with mastery over storms and lightning, surrounded by a powerful tempest that shapes the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to create a large tempest and control its environment makes it a significant threat in combat.
goals: To dominate the battlefield with storms and lightning, creating chaos among foes.
relations: Related to other elemental beings, often encountered in stormy or chaotic environments.
environment: Typically found in stormy, chaotic areas where its powers can flourish.
strengths: Immunity to poison and various conditions plus resistances to several damage types enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that can bypass its resistances.
attacks: The Storm Lord can make powerful slam attacks and fire devastating lightning bolts.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest creates a large storm, imposing disadvantages and hindering movement of foes.
senses: It has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 17.
skills: Proficient in athletics (+10), nature (+6), and perception (+7), demonstrating its versatile nature.
additional_information: Can push creatures away with its storm power.
Capable of inflicting deafening thunder damage with Thunder Clap.
Creates an environment that extinguishes flames and impedes visibility.
High physical and magical resilience with various immunities.
Excellent melee and ranged combat capabilities.
test_queries: elemental that controls storms and lightning
huge storm monster that creates tempests
monster surrounded by a thunderous storm
huge creature with thunder clap ability
